whispering-grove.name: Whispering Grove
whispering-grove.desc: The elders' voices seem to ride the wind. Paths lead in all directions.

murky-path.name: Murky Path
murky-path.desc: Mist clings to the ground; your steps are hushed.

hidden-vale.name: Hidden Vale
hidden-vale.desc: A secluded glen where light fights to reach the earth.

ancient-tree.name: Ancient Tree
ancient-tree.desc: Roots like ribs of the world encircle you.

enchanted-grove.name: Enchanted Grove
enchanted-grove.desc: Whispers take on a musical tone.

shadow-hollow.name: Shadow Hollow
shadow-hollow.desc: A hush falls. The air thickens with malice.
